item.title: Johnny Cash - The Mercy Seat
item.description: Performed by Johnny Cash Written by Nick Cave

item.title: Vince Guaraldi Trio - Christmas Time Is Here (Vocal)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F. But it is a jazz song, so who really knows.
As performed by The Vince Guaraldi Trio
Okay...NOT the easiest song, and certainly not something you will use with beginners...however, this is a roadmap in the original Key that is playable with practice...and really, who doesn't want this in their repertoire?
Need to take it slower? Use the gear icon on the video to slow the speed!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Alessia Cara - How Far I'll Go (From "Moana"/Alessia Cara Version)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F.
As performed by Alessia Cara
The audio has been adjusted to move from the original Key of E to F, and then to remove the key change at the end. Note the barre chords: Bbm, Bb, F, and Fmaj7 (These last two occur at the end)
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com. The
